parameters: Oh...I can't believe there's a path like this in the
middle of the woods... Indeed, it's easy to walk on.
We might be able to go home earlier than planned.

Hey, hey Serena. Let's talk about love, love.

While we couldn't meet due to being far away, news

After all, I neither know his face nor his voice,

... That's about as much as I can say about my love

Yes, if we talk about pity...it would have been none

Currently, my sister and I are the only children in

the current situation of our household without
a son is a bit...very precarious. \n< Serena >
So naturally, I have to get married as soon as
possible and give birth to a son.
While my daddy is alive, if either myself or
my elder sister can give birth to a son, the family
estate will be passed on from my daddy to that child,
and everything will be wrapped up neatly. \n< Serena >
However, it's not the case that just anyone can be a
If possible, among relatives, choose someone with as
The person who met those conditions and

At the point where we finally managed to make it a

I can sense the fatigue of a father who bears the

Well... to be honest, there is a sense of relief. I
don't mean it in a way that it would have been good
Being told to marry a stranger suddenly one day...
However, it is our duty to continue the family line
and leave offspring. I also believe that I must have
So, well. I have mixed feelings.
...One thing I can say is that if I had married him,
I wouldn't be able to do what I'm doing here now. \n< Serena >
I have no intention of discussing the merits or
demerits of the matter itself, but I wish to do my
best in the situation given to me.
From Father's perspective, even this would be a

However, there is an elder sister in my house.

be able to control the situation.

who will be the most sad about it!

events.name: 第一部ラストイベント　移動

parameters: It seems like it will take more time to get through
the forest. I hope Lady Erika is safe…
However, to help others and end up being caught
yourself... that's just like Lady Erika.
Come to think of it, I was helped by Lady Erika in
this forest before. Therefore, it's my turn this time!
